cause.description:
At the rate that current elections are going, what do you think will happen by the year 2036. I for one don't want to see where all this chaos is going. Support a winner. Support Sam Cook for president in 2036.
1. Health care is a universal right.
2. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately.
3. I own Australia, and you know whoever has Australia always wins.
cause.name: Sam Cook for president in 2036
